raw_items: Employed as part-time dental surgeon for Beresford Dental Practice Limited, 207 Upper Richmond Road, SW15 6SQ. From March 2016 until further notice I will receive drawings of £250 a month for an expected commitment of up to 300 hours a year. (Updated 22 February 2016)
